channel.title: Looking for any tips on auxy
channel.description: Im new to the community, which is so far very welcoming and friendly, and I’m still learning how to use the app to the best of its ability. If there are any more experienced producers that have used this app for a while that are willing to share, give some tips on how i can improve

item.title: Looking for any tips on auxy
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Hey, this is very similar to topic I linked. I noticed there’s a few of them though, but this seems most recent.

Read full topic
